I recently had the opportunity to dine at Pizza Hut Union Place, and overall, it was a good experience. The atmosphere of the restaurant was pleasant, and the food tasted delicious.

title: Pizza Hut - Union Place
text:
Finally properly getting to review Pizza Hut. Been eating it for years now but yes.. never bothered taking the time out to review. To be honest, I love Pizza hut compared to any other brand in the same category of food. But their issue is same as the others… Consistency is never there, there are days when their pizzas are good but I have to make it a point to tell them this. But it gets frustrating to do it all the time. The social media campaigns and pictures are what the usual pizzas should look like, given the price of the pizzas. But however, it never is. The cheese is also not enough at times and the stuffing is not that great.

Lets rate now….My usual orders are the following and I am going to rate the dishes next to each one.

Hot butter cuttlefish pizza:
Flavor is 8/10
Stuffing & quality is 4/10

Chicken Hawaiian Pizza
Flavor is 87/10
Stuffing & quality is 2/10
I have literally counter.. on a personal pan pizza there are 4 cubes of pineapples…. JUST 4
On a large there are close to 15… which is nothing for a pizza that people want pineapple on 😊

Hot and spicy pizza
Flavor is 9/10
Stuffing & quality is 5/10
(If anyone remembers the outlet that served slices at Liberty plaza and cresecat.. you know that this is not the same any more… Come on guys… stand out and keep up to your reputation.

Cheese lovers
Flavor is 7/10
Stuffing & quality is 4/10

Chicken Lovers
Flavor is 8/10
Stuffing & quality is 7/10
This was the first time I ordered it and given the number of toppings it came well…

Double chicken and cheese
Flavor is 8/10
Stuffing & quality is 8/10
The only one that stood out… Now no longer available on the menu…. ☹

The marketing team needs to work on the discount voucher if the survey is done. You make it impossible to do it to get the 20 % discount and when we do complete it we are to retain the old bill till the next time we order… send an SMS or something guys come on.

Overall Pizza hut can be the best of the best.. However unless a proper survey is done and the feedback is listened to and the steps are taken to maintain good stuffing and consistency you are going to loose clients.
Look forward to hearing back from pizza hut on this for any further concerns.
